faqs.q: How many calories in a pint of Guinness?
faqs.a: Approximately 210 kcal for a standard UK pint.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a pint Guinness?
faqs.a: About 15 g of carbohydrates, primarily from malted barley.

faqs.q: Does Guinness have any fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Zero fat and zero cholesterol per pint.

faqs.q: How does Guinness compare calorie-wise to other beers?
faqs.a: Similar to many lagers (around 150-250 kcal per pint), but lower than cream stouts.
Yes, only about 40 mg sodium per pint, making it relatively low.
